name: "Slow and Steady" Winter Beanie
description:
Our fur-trimmed winter beanie will keep you warm this winter! 

There are 4 color options:
BLACK 
BLUE 
GRAY 
& BURGUNDY. 

Each feature there own colored authentic rabbit-fur pom pom. 

Supplies are limited and pom pom colors can swapped to custom design your own (add message with purchase!)

Enjoy!

name: "Get Religion"
description:
All the Fad! This Nose Chain is styled with a brass colored cross chain. Whether your religious or not, this is a great piece. Earring is gold coated, as always. 

This Nose Chain can be made for someone with or without a nose piercing. The picture shows a gold coated CLIP-ON nose hoop. But, if your nose is already pierced it is easy to attach the chain to your own hoop ring.

Enjoy!
